# Basil & Sage Homes Website

## About This Website
This is a Real Estate website for Basil & Sage Homes, a professional property management company serving rental homes in Ladson, South Carolina.
Website: www.basilandsagehomes.com

## Design & Development
Designed by Scott Dixon, a Creative Web and Application Designer living in Charleston, South Carolina.
Website: www.scottdixoncreative.com

## Website Purpose
- Property listings and rental home information
- Tenant testimonials and reviews
- Property comparison tools
- Contact and inquiry forms
- About the company and services

## Technology
Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript featuring modern web design with iOS-style glass effects, responsive layouts, and dynamic animations.
